article.title: Staff Directory - Atlanta U.S. Export Assistance Center
article.summary: Contact the staff at the Atlanta U.S. Export Assistance Center.
article.content:
​NOTE: The first step to engaging ourTrade Specialistsis to complete our online engagement questionnaire. Pleaseclick hereto complete the form.

**Our Trade Specialists are assigned according to industry sector. If your industry sector is not listed, please contact Hannah Kamenetsky.** ​ ​

Name & Title

**Industries

E-Mail and Telephone

Vacant, USEAC Director
Dina Molaison CGBP, Senior International Trade SpecialistAerospace & Defense and Information & Communication Technology

Dina.Molaison@trade.gov

404-815-1530

Amy Ryan CGBP, Senior International Trade SpecialistBuilding Products, Education, Energy, Environmental Technologies, Floor Coverings, Mining Equipment and General Industrial Equipment

Amy.Ryan@trade.gov

404-815-1748

Eric Johnson CGBP, Senior International Trade SpecialistAgri-business, Apparel, Chemicals, Consumer Goods, Cosmetics, Franchising, Food Processing/Packaging Equipment, Pharmaceuticals, Poultry & Poultry Equipment Processed Foods, and Veterinary Supplies & Equipment

Eric.Johnson@trade.gov

404-815-1750

Hannah Kamenetsky, Acting Office Director and Commercial OfficerArchitecture/Engineering, Financial Services, General Business Services, Management Consulting, Safety and Security, Travel and Tourism

Hannah.Kamenetsky@trade.gov

404-815-1596

Michael Waters CGBP, International Trade SpecialistAutomotive/Transportation,Healthcare, MarineEquipment and Supplies,Printing and Publishing, Paper Products and Equipment, Plastics

Michael.Waters@trade.gov

404-815-1498

Susan Kintanar, U.S. Ex-Im Bank Export Regional DirectorInternational Trade Finance

Susan.Kintanar@exim.gov

404-815-1497

Sandro Murtas, SBA Regional ManagerInternational Trade Finance

Sandro.Murtas@sba.gov

404-815-1496

Trade Information Center (TIC)
Washington DC		The Trade Information Center works in conjunction with your local office. For immediate export assistance or for answers to your technical questions on exporting, call M-F 8:30am – 6:00pm Eastern time.

1-800-USA-TRADE

(800-872-8723)

75 Fifth Street NW. Suite 1060 ​Tel:404-815-1817
​Atlanta, GA 30308 ​Fax:404-347-0002
